title: fo-07: Page Routes and Navigation
description:
Create FO-07 page routes, info page, and add to overview

- `app/fo-04/layout.tsx` - Reference for layout

notes:
2026-01-27 12:31 - FO-07 page routes follow the same pattern as FO-04: page.tsx imports FOExperience, layout.tsx wraps children with a client layout component, and the client layout uses navTree for submenu items.
2026-01-27 12:34 - Key insight: FO-07 info page follows InfoPageWrapper component pattern from FO-04. Uses same section structure (InfoSummaryBox, Core Concept, How It Works, Key Differences table, Key Features, custom section, TechnicalDetails). All comparison table content and technical details documented as specified in task.
2026-01-27 12:35 - FO-07 overview entry added. Used 'None (single review)' for Learning column since FO-07 has no feedback loop/iterative batches. Pattern follows FO-06 entry style.
2026-01-27 12:36 - EPIC COMPLETE: Created page routes (page.tsx, layout.tsx), info page comparing FO-07 to FO-04, and added FO-07 to overview. Key files: app/fo-07/page.tsx, app/fo-07/info/page.tsx, app/overview/page.tsx
closed_reason: All page routes and navigation complete: main page, info page, and overview entry
